name: IpDebug
brief:
Debug assertion and verbose tracing macros

Provides compile-time controlled debugging facilities:

IPOPT_CHECKLEVEL > 0 enables:
- DBG_ASSERT(cond): Runtime assertions
- DBG_ASSERT_EXCEPTION(cond, type, msg): Conditional exceptions
- DBG_DO(cmd): Execute only in debug mode

IPOPT_VERBOSITY >= 1 enables tracing:
- DBG_START_FUN/DBG_START_METH: Trace function entry/exit
- DBG_PRINT: Printf-style debug output with indentation
- DBG_EXEC: Conditional execution based on verbosity

All macros compile to nothing when disabled (zero overhead).
